text: Fire on the Amazon is a 1993 American Peruvian adventure drama movie directed by Luis Llosa and starring Craig Sheffer, Sandra Bullock, Juan Fern√°ndez, Judith Chapman, Ramsay Ross, Eduardo Cesti. ==Other websites== * Category:1993 drama movies Category:1993 adventure movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American drama movies Category:Peruvian movies Category:Movies directed by Luis Llosa
